author: calixtorontocalix
title: Cardano Creatives
description: カルダノの開発者コミュニティと新興のクリエイティブコミュニティの間の溝を埋めて、未開拓の機会を獲得するにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？

f6_assessments.q0:
Disclaimer: my view points are shaped by my multi-year experience in product management and software development.

The proposal aims to increase particiaption and contributions from a noticeable segment of people, which supports one of the goals of Fund 8 to grow the number of contributors to the ecosystem.

At the same time, the proposal would be stronger if it included:
1) a description of hisrorical success stories of creative contributions to cardano community to provide insights for potential impact and necessary funds.
2) an analysis of use cases or areas where application of creative skills sets can bring high ROI to the community.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point because this initiaitve supports only one of three strategic goals of Fund 8.
- 1 point for the lack of a discusion about pontential use cases and their impact on Cardano ecosystem.
My rating is 3.
f6_assessments.q1:
The Catalyst community is welcoming and inclusive, so it is well positioned to onboard new contributors of diverse skills.

At the same time, because the proposal does not describe specific use cases or areas where creative skills can bring high ROI, making it hard to judge if the requested funds are sufficent to achieve a noticeable impact.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point for the lack of specific use cases.
- 1 point for the lack of a discussion about the sufficiency of the requested funds to achieve a noticeable impact.
My rating is 3.
f6_assessments.q2:
The defined metrics can track some progress with regards to the activities made (the number of submitted/funded proposals).

However, they are insufficient to track the progress towards solving the underlying problem (increase the number of contributions from creatives). I'd suggest to consider the following metrics to make the proposal stronger:
1) the % of votes, proposals, new apps coming  built by/with the participation of creatives.
2) the % of users of cardano apps developed with the help of creatives.
3) the % of new users onboarded into cardano through engagement with creative works.
4) the user satisfaction with apps/proposal created with creative paricipation vs the same without.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point for the lack of metrics evaluating the relative impact on the Cardano ecosystem.
- 1 point for the lack of metrics evaluating user satisfaction and competitiveness.
My rating is 3.

f6_assessments.q0: The challenge defines a group, creatives, seeking to contribute to the Cardano ecosystem which aligns with Cardano's mission. To make the challenge excellent: better articulate how the challenge aligns with more than one of the Fund 8 Strategic Goals.
f6_assessments.q1: There are two other creative targeting challenges with smaller budget requests. The Catalyst community has the capacity to address this challenge or all three challenges if it so desires.
f6_assessments.q2: The success criteria is simply proposals are submitted under the challenge which is not particularly creative. The metrics are similarly focused on proposals instead of something more meaningful or impactful. To improve challenge: better articulate how the success criteria address the challenge and how the metrics can measure progress towards the success criteria.

f6_assessments.q0:
This challenge is well aligned with Cardano and will bring new ideas that helps engage community members from various disciplines.  Adding diversity will allow Cardano to evolve, grow and show value.
A recommendation would be to add what are some the key challenges or risks that creative community has today with using Cardano today.  This will help spur ideas to address some of those aspects.
f6_assessments.q1: There has been a lot of interest in the last few months in the creative space in Cardano.  With new innovation comes new challenges and road blocks.  So far there has been good progress in the creative community and the projects that have been proposed so far show the aptitude the community has to address this issue.  The Fund7 challenges have had good engagement in projects that have creative elements.  (Gamers On-chained 58 proposals, Community Events 61 proposals, etc.)  There are also a few proposals in the Misc. category that could have fit into this challenge. (4+)
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has KPIs that will measure stakeholder interest in this challenge with number of proposed projects.  It also has a way to measure proposer engagement with number of successful proposals.
Another recommendation is a KPI to measure successfully launched programs into the community at large either as a future fund KPI or during this campaign.

importance: Catalystが飛躍的に成長するには、クリエーターが提案を開発し、改良し、カルダノコミュニティにリリースするための専用コミュニティが必要です。
success: Catalystのメンバーは、Fund 8以降のCardano Creatives Challengeの中で提案を行い、この未開拓のカテゴリーを構築していきます。
